turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Emma. I'm thirsty and tired.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How can I help you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would you please order me a coffee from Pete's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I can order a coffee from Pete's. Would you like me to pull up your last order there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I had a drink that was a little spicy and very refreshing.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm looking at your last order now. It appears you had an Iced Havana Cappuccino.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That was it. Would you please order that for me again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. Would you like a small, medium or large.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you tell me the calories for each?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me check. The calories for a traditional sized drink are 96.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Huh. I wonder what traditional means? Never mind. Please order me a medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: O.k. I will order you a medium Iced Havana Cappuccino from Pete's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like dairy or non-dairy milk with that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% cow's milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: O.k. I am ordering you a medium Iced Havana from Pete's with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. When can I swing by the shop on Main Street in Culver City to pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink will be ready at the Pete's on Main Street in Culver City in about 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. And would you please use my credit card on file to pay for the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: O.k. I will use your credit card on file to pay for the order of an Iced Havana Cappuccino with 2% milk, which will be ready for pick up at the Main Street Pete's in Culver City in about 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you. Have a nice day.
